casebody.data:
Greg ABBOTT, Governor of Texas, et al., appellants,
v.
Shannon PEREZ, et al. No. 17-586. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 12, 2018.

Appeals from the United States District Court for the Western District of Texas. Further consideration of the questions of jurisdiction is postponed to the hearing of the case on the merits. The case is consolidated *736and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
